      • updateMetric

        public MetricCrudDTO updateMetric(MetricDTO dto)
                           throws BadInputException,
                                  IllegalStateTransitionException,
                                  NotFoundException,
                                  DBException
        This method updates a Metric. This is useful when a Metricator modifies the Metric's fields. ModelMapper is used to retrieve the old Metric instance.
        Specified by:
        updateMetric in interface MetricCRUDInterface
        Parameters:
        dto - MetricDTO
        Returns:
        MetricCrudDTO
        Throws:
        BadInputException
        IllegalStateTransitionException
        NotFoundException
        DBException

      • changeStateMetric

        public MetricCrudDTO changeStateMetric(MetricDTO dto)
                                throws BadInputException,
                                       IllegalStateTransitionException,
                                       NotFoundException,
                                       DBException
        This method just change state to a Metric. This is useful when a project manager just needs to approve/reject a Metric without change the Metric's fields. ModelMapper is used just to clone the Metric instance, so the set is made manually.
        Specified by:
        changeStateMetric in interface MetricCRUDInterface
        Parameters:
        dto, - in which must be id, releaseNote, state
        Returns:
        MetricCrudDTO
        Throws:
        BadInputException
        IllegalStateTransitionException
        NotFoundException
        DBException
